settings.review_text: FOUNDO is a brand that believes in the power of art and fashion to go hand-in-hand. Art is the oldest form of luxury goods, and it can inspire the design and patterns of our products. We also believe that it is our duty to help small artists rise as we grow our brand. Our mission is to help artists influence culture in a broader way, not just through art pieces, but through other mediums such as physical luxury goods.

settings.title: Terrell Jones
settings.text: The goal of Evil In Colour is to express boundless creativity through familiar & unfamiliar iconography.

settings.review_text: As part of our commitment to art, we have partnered with over 30 digital artists and are continuing to partner with more artists every day. Digital art is a form of artistic expression that uses digital technology as a crucial part of the creation of the art piece. It encompasses a wide range of practices, from digital painting and digital photography to 3D modeling, virtual reality, and even algorithm-based generative art.

Throughout history, each major shift in art has often been associated with advancements in technology and changes in society. For example, the invention of photography in the 19th century challenged painters to explore new forms of expression, leading to movements like Impressionism. Similarly, the rise of industrialization and urbanization in the early 20th century influenced the development of movements like Cubism and Futurism.

Today, we live in a digital age, where technology permeates every aspect of our lives. Just as past artists used the tools and technologies available to them to express their ideas and respond to their environment, contemporary artists are doing the same with digital technology. We believe that digital art will be the next big art movement.

The digital artists we partner with span across a variety of genres, including glitch, AI, pop-precisionism and minimalism, surrealism, and even “on-chain” art. Each of these genres has its own unique attributes and style.

With each artist, we release an exclusive art collection, usually in editions of 50-150 pieces each. FOUNDO VIP members get first access to these collections. Collectors of these art pieces are then able to get exclusive access to the limited-edition physical counterparts to these art pieces, physical products that are inspired by these art pieces.

We believe that art is an important cultural pillar for society, and it can also enrich our products and the enjoyment our customers get out of them. Digital art is still a young medium, but we hope that as FOUNDO grows, we can help digital artists influence culture in a broader way. We can’t wait to meet more amazing artists and see all the amazing art that is yet to come.
